design_system.name: Lumina Social
design_system.core_philosophy: Content is the hero. The UI is the frame.

primary.description: Obsidian Black for primary actions/text in light mode.

background.description: Pure white/black. No off-whites for the main canvas.

accent.description: Electric Blue. Use SPARINGLY (only for 'Follow' buttons, notification dots, active states).

grid_modes.sidebar_left: hidden lg:block col-span-3 sticky top-24 h-[calc(100vh-6rem)]
grid_modes.sidebar_right: hidden md:block col-span-4 lg:col-span-3 sticky top-24 h-[calc(100vh-6rem)]

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-semibold transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-muted text-foreground hover:bg-muted/80 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 w-10 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center transition-colors
buttons.outline: border-2 border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-3xl border-none shadow-sm overflow-hidden
cards.glass: bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/70 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/20 dark:border-white/10 rounded-3xl shadow-lg

inputs.base: flex h-12 w-full rounded-2xl border border-input bg-muted/50 px-4 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-0 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 transition-all focus:bg-background

navigation.sidebar_link: flex items-center gap-4 px-4 py-3 text-lg font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground hover:bg-muted/50 rounded-2xl transition-colors
navigation.sidebar_link_active: flex items-center gap-4 px-4 py-3 text-lg font-bold text-foreground bg-muted rounded-2xl

setup: Add the Google Fonts link to the <head> of public/index.html immediately.
Update tailwind.config.js to include the new font families (Manrope, Inter, JetBrains Mono).
Update tailwind.config.js to extend borderRadius with '3xl': '1.5rem', '2xl': '1rem'.
Install 'lucide-react' for icons if not present.
styling_rules: NEVER use default Shadcn 'card' for the main feed. Use the 'cards.base' style defined above (no border, shadow-sm).
Use 'Manrope' for all headings (h1-h3) and 'Inter' for body text.
For the Sidebar, use 'sticky' positioning. It must stay fixed while the feed scrolls.
For the Chat interface, use the 'glass_light' surface for the message bubbles of the OTHER user, and 'primary' color for the CURRENT user.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.

layout_strategy.feed: The feed should be the center of attention. Use a max-width of '600px' for the feed column to ensure readability.
layout_strategy.sidebar: The sidebar should be clean, with large icons and text. No clutter.
layout_strategy.mobile: On mobile, move the sidebar navigation to a bottom tab bar (fixed at bottom, z-50, glass effect).

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style

Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
